Description: Painted red ware pottery vessel. Rim sherd from an open form, probably a bowl. Red, black and white painted decoration, including a dolphin. Decorated with wide white bands following deep wheel marks. Very micaceous orange-brown Nile silt, with white and sand inclusions.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.) (Phase 3)
